short_summary: Executive Assistant for Temporary Help Services
description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) has a requirement for the provision of an Executive Assistant for Temporary Help Services (THS).
tags: National Capital Region (NCR) region of delivery
full_summary:
# Tender Notice

**Document Title:** Executive Assistant
**Tender Number:** 2023-01160

**Issuing Agency:** Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
**Address:** 59 Camelot Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K2G 5X4
**Contact Info:** Catherine Clairoux, (343) 596-9265 (ph); catherine.clairoux\@inspection.gc.ca

**Tender Details:**
* **Solicitation Method:** Request for Proposal (RFP) - Competitive
* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Tender Description:** The CFIA requires an Executive Assistant to provide support services for a temporary period.
* **Work Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Expected Closing Date:** April 12, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Eligibility Criteria:**
* Bidders must have Canadian business registration
* Bidders must meet the Canadian government's Controlled Goods regulations
* Bidders must be able to provide certification of registration in the Unified System for Trade Operations (UST)

**Changes:**
This tender notice was last updated on March 31, 2023.

**Attachments:**
* A tender notice document is available for download from the CanadaBuy website (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4443/2023-01160-rfp_0.pdf).

**Note:**
Please note that this opportunity is no longer available, as indicated by the tender status.

| Category | Bidders | Details |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Tender Response Deadline | April 12, 2023 | 2:00 PM EST |
| Tender Description | Executive Assistant services for temporary need | - |
| Required Deliverables | Support services from an Executive Assistant | - |
| Evaluation Criteria | Lowest price | - |

**Trade Agreements:**
None

**Regions of Opportunity and Delivery:**
* Canada
* National Capital Region (NCR)

**Languages**
Available in English & French
